item.description:
One of our members spoke very highly of Oasis Grill, a middle eastern restaurant in Providence. Never one to pass up a good falafel, I have decided that it is my duty to investigate (and more importantly to eat there)!

Join me this Saturday SUNDAY at 11 AM on a trip from THE PROVIDENCE SIDE of the East Bay Bikepath as we bike the whole way (around 26 miles), followed by an optional trip to the Oasis Grill. It doesn't seem like it would be particularly safe to bike to the restaurant (due to cars), so I'm planning to drive there.

We're not going to be going very fast, usual speeds. I'm going to be wearing my stylish bike helmet, and I suggest (but do not require) that you do the same.

We'll meet at the parking lot near the Vets Memorial at Scenic Overlook just north of the address listed. Here's a map of the location

-Adam
item.how_to_find_us: I have a red car and a red bike, also I have a cell: 401-699-7304
item.name: East Bay Bikepath and Oasis Grill! ~ 12 mph / 26 miles
